text: Molly Peters (15 March 1942 - 30 May 2017) was an English actress and model. She was born in Walsham-le-Willows, Suffolk, England. She was best known for her role in the James Bond movie Thunderball as Patricia Fearing. Her career lasted from 1964 through 1967. Peters appeared in Playboy, in the November 1965 issue. Her appearance was as part of a photo essay entitled "James Bond's Girls", by Richard Maibaum. On 30 May 2017, Peters died at the age of 75 from complications of a stroke in London, England. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English models Category:Actors from Suffolk Category:Actresses who played Bond girls
title: Molly Peters
